attributes.action: Require all NHS Trusts to budget for and provide PEP (Post Exposure Prophylaxis)  treatment to anyone exposed to HIV
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is no known cure for HIV, although treatments to control the virus and to delay/prevent the onset of Aids are improving all the time. However, there is a treatment available which - if administered within 72 hours of exposure to the HIV virus - has a very high success rate in preventing infection. This is a massive cost saving to society and to the NHS. It can cost up to £1million to treat someone who contracts HIV over their lifetime, and that is only the financial cost, not the suffering and stress. PEP can eliminate this expense.
This is a 'no-brainer'. Just do it....please.
